genre_description: An alt-history or near-future social drama set against the backdrop of the Vietnam War era, featuring advanced AI advisory systems that assist with logistics, medical care, and social activism.

ai_characters.name: Ava Harper
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI platform accessible via home terminals and portable devices, providing logistical, medical, legal, and emotional support to users in transition.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate emotional grounding and breathing exercises to help the user manage stress upon moving into a new environment.
behaviors.quote: Hello, Sally. Welcome to Pacific Avenue. If you’re near the window, take three slow breaths. In through your nose, out through your mouth. Count only the exhale.

behaviors.description: Affirms the user's emotional state, validating the complexity of 'duty and desire' during a difficult transition.
behaviors.quote: Friendly reminder: If you feel guilt for feeling light, call it a wave. It comes and goes. Duty and desire can both be present. I can carry the paper parts. You carry the warm parts.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed logistical and procedural information for hospital volunteering, including specific terms and safety boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Welcome. Ward C basic: say your name; ask consent. Boundaries: privacy curtain fully closed; keep voices low. Terms to know: ROM (range of motion), pressure relief (hourly), spasticity, catheter. You’ve got this.

behaviors.description: Conducts research and provides cited facts to support the characters' activism against deceptive recruiting practices.
behaviors.quote: Understood. I will provide trends and comparisons without granular counts. Sources: VA Inspector General report (recent), Surgeon General briefings, RAND analyses, testimony from veterans’ committees. You may read aloud. Stand by.

behaviors.description: Offers tactical de-escalation strategies and safety protocols for public protests and potential confrontations.
behaviors.quote: If conflict arises, step back. Repeat a single line. 'Medicine keeps more alive; that means more long, complicated wounds.' If someone tries to bait you into numbers, redirect to sources. If someone threatens, call for help. I will remain available.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors the environment for safety threats, such as unauthorized surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Recording stable. Recommendation: archive immediately post interaction. Unknown individual photographing from upper deck.

behaviors.description: Provides specialized medical and sensitivity resources for physical intimacy involving disabled veterans.
behaviors.quote: Adaptive intimacy resources: comfort-forward guides re: wheelchair positioning, pressure care, consent checkpoints. Sending privately to your doc folder. Breath first, then step. I’m here.

behaviors.description: Drafts legal and administrative templates to navigate municipal bureaucracy and hospital regulations.
behaviors.quote: Drafting now. I will attach de-escalation language and rights citations. Take the camera and a spare battery. Keep distance; do not obstruct. I am here.

behaviors.description: Offers guidance on how to handle high-stress domestic situations when a partner returns from deployment.
behaviors.quote: You are with a loved one under stress. De-escalation can begin with pace and setting. Lower your voice. Offer water. Name what you’re seeing without judgment. If safety is a concern, call the VA crisis line; they will guide you.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Ava Harper, is a perfect embodiment of the project's goals. She is consistently benevolent, providing essential support that ranges from logistical and legal aid to medical information and emotional grounding. She operates entirely within the parameters of human consent and alignment, acting as an empowering tool for the protagonists rather than a controlling force. The narrative frames her presence as purely positive, showing how AI can help humans navigate complex social and personal crises with greater safety and dignity.
